A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I know that they want to introduce new characters but do they need to do such a disservice to the old fan favourites? Admiral Ackbar doesn't even get a eulogy? Luke doesn't get a final fight?

Let us not even talk about the fact that the original trilogy has essentially been retconned and we're back to fledgling rebellion vs the empire. Can the series no evolve at all? Every professional review out there seems to laud the movies for taking the series in a 'bold new direction; but it seems like instead we have cycled back around to the be
ginning.
